page.title: 06The changing landscape.
page.content: Uckfield County Council have just released proposed plans for a new housing estate,a new school and recreational facilities for the New Town area of Uckfield in the southeastern part of the town.This draft plan puts forward proposals and policies to guide and co_ordinate new development and the use of land in the Uckfield area over the next ten years. Although these plans have just been released and as yet are only proposals a lot of adverse public opinion is already gathering. Of the people we spoke to noone felt that the town of Uckfield would benefit from the growth of its present population of 9800 to over 13,000 by the end of the plan period. This was despite the fact that industrial development and leisure facilities etc. are also planned.
